attributes.action: Stop the sale of peanut and nut products in any business involving children
attributes.additional_details:
To promote Allergies
To educate people about allergies
All schools aim to be nut free so why not other child friendly environments
attributes.background: To stop the sale of peanut and nut products in places such as, children play centres, cinemas, theatres, theme parks etc. places where you use or share, equipment, seating and so on.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about people with nut allergies, but it's not clear if you want nuts to be banned in all public and private spaces where children are allowed, or just certain types of establishments. It's also not clear if you want the Government to take additional actions to educate people about allergies.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
